alert.note: Alert for Okaloosa; Santa Rosa (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 05 at 5:35PM EDT until July 05 at 6:15PM EDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Okaloosa County in northwestern Florida... Northeastern Santa Rosa County in northwestern Florida... * Until 515 PM CDT. * At 435 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 13 miles northwest of Baker, or 18 miles southeast of Brewton, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Baker. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
